title: Full Show: Fresh from the Miss Universe Pageant!
itunes:title: Full Show: Fresh from the Miss Universe Pageant!
description:
In this episode we join our heroes in a conversation about Harvey's scattered nerves during the Miss Universe Competition. A woman writes to Shirley about not getting the flowers she likes and the husband who has no clue that that is an actual thing/issue.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
